attributes.action: year 11's should revise one subject for 2 months then be tested.
attributes.additional_details: Made by Oceana-Skye Campbell and Jaiden Blondell
attributes.background: I feel that focusing on one subject at a time will enable students to reach a higher grading. Also not be overwhelmed by stress and pressure of studying for multiple subjects at one time.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
